An_approachable_performant_and_versatile: An approachable, performant and versatile boilerplate for building SSR applications.
Add_components_without_sending_additiona: Add components without sending additional client-side JavaScript. Built on the latest React features.
Automatic_Image_Font_and_Script_Optimiza: Automatic Image, Font, and Script Optimizations for improved UX and Core Web Vitals.
A_rich_incredibly_adoptable_template_tha: A rich, incredibly adoptable template that scales between a small showcase website and a full-size app.
This_is_a_simple_about_page_just_to_show: This is a simple about page just to show how you can use the internationalization in different pages
Everything_is_recorded_But_when_God_allo: «Everything is recorded. But when God allows a person to change something in his destiny, he brings him to an astrologer».

items.title: Gem astrology. Magical power of stones

aboutMe.introduction: I'm Oksana Yurlova, a practicing astrologer with experience in solving various client requests. I've been consulting for over 5 years. I graduated from Elena Negrey's Professional School of Western Astrology. I studied at Konstantin Daragan's courses. I travel a lot, having visited 56 countries.
aboutMe.certificatesTitle: Certificates confirmed by license from the Ministry of Education
aboutMe.helpTitle: How my consultations can help you:
helpItems: Working as an employee, want my own business;
Selecting a date for business registration;
Bright events this year, forecast for the year;
Want a divorce/or how to save my marriage;
Where to look for my love;
Want an analysis of my wife/husband/friend/child/boss;
Where to develop a child: sections/clubs;
What's the best day for my date/marriage/car purchase/apartment/vacation/move;
Understanding sexual, psychological interaction in a couple;
Finances, income/loss of money in prognostics;

title: Karmic Horoscope - Time for Self-Realization

features.past: ✓ Description of past karmic experience, your knowledge baggage;
features.abilities: ✓ Certain abilities you were born with and brought from previous incarnations.

karmaDescription.path: Karma is the path that must be followed in this incarnation.
karmaDescription.warning: If you are not on the right path, you receive a warning from the Universe at certain periods of life, and then losses come.
karmaDescription.development: To work out the karmic task in this incarnation, a person must necessarily develop in the right direction.

format.label: Format:
format.description: consultations are held in video format, with live communication (Skype, Telegram, WhatsApp, Zoom, etc. + astrobook (printed summary of key points) + video consultations).

requiredData.title: Data required for consultation:
requiredData.date: ✓ Year, month and date of birth;
requiredData.time: ✓ Time of birth from the tag or as told by mother (if there is no exact time of birth, we do rectification).

astrologerConspects.title: Astrologer's Conspects

benefits.1: Having all the astrologer's conspects, you can easily start understanding your charts and the charts of your loved ones.
benefits.2: No fluff, only the most important, structured information collected over many years of work.
benefits.3: You can take a personal consultation and I will teach you how to work with conspects, templates, read your natal chart.

astrologerConspects.price: The cost of one block of conspects:

2.title: Block II.
description: Major aspects, planets in the shaft, retro planets

3.title: Block III.
description: Houses of the horoscope, rulers of houses

5.title: Block V.
description: Moon phases, lunar eclipses, solar eclipses

6.title: Block VI.
description: Synastry, chart comparison, aspects in synastry

10.title: Block X.
description: Medical astrology, health, aspects of health

AstroYogaSection.title: Yoga Retreats
AstroYogaSection.subtitle: Individual Retreat Tour
AstroYogaSection.description: If you want to stop and reboot, improve your mental and spiritual state, find answers, go into study, just relax, do a deep self-analysis under the guidance of masters using spiritual practices - join US.

mainGoal.title: Main goal:
mainGoal.description: to cleanse consciousness, physical body, through deep self-analysis, which leads to spiritual, mental and physical recovery.

features.12: Everyone chooses their own goal and type of retreat (spiritual, creative, biohacking).

AstroYogaSection.checkInDates: Check-in on dates convenient for you!!!
